title: 'Centre-half poised for permanent Saints move'
title_page: 'Centre-half poised for permanent Saints move' - BBC Sport
maintext:
St Johnstone are poised to announce the signing of a centre-half on a permanent deal after manager Steven MacLean admitted the Perth club had been "behind the eight-ball" in the transfer market this summer. (The Courier), external
